prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
ADITYA SHRIVASTAVA
SAFe 6.0 AGILIST Contact: +91-9907056287
Certified Scrum master E-Mail ID: aditya.scdl@gmail.com
Certified product owner Address:- House no.150 (2nd floor),
7th Cross, Marathahalli, Bangalore - 560037
B.E.(Information Technology)
M.B.A.(IT & Marketing)
Summary
Management and Software professional with 14+ years of experience in Project Management, People Management, Project
Coordination, SAFe Agile Framework, Release Management, Requirement Analysis and Requirement Gathering and
Development.
• Scrum Master/Project Management experience in improving processes and product deliveries by implementing an Agile
environment along with Scrum framework ensuring Continuous Improvement/Continuous Delivery Process.
• Hands-on experience in mentoring the teams and Co-ordinating with different stakeholders along with the product owners to
remove impediments and backlogs and helping teams to adopt SAFe 6 Framework to help organizations become Lean Enterprise
and achieve Business Agility.
• Have worked as Program Manager/Project Manager to accelerate the Project Communications, Coordination, Analysis,
Implementation, Customized development, Support and Maintenance, Migrations, Enhancements (Centre of Excellence),
Release Management, Risk Management and Change Management, Test Automations Suite.
• Successfully managed projects as Release Manager like Cisco Enterprise Release Management Organization (ERMO) by
collaborating with cross-functional businesses and IT teams to provide release planning and delivery services using a consistent
set of tools and processes.
• Technical experience in the Analysis, Design, Development, Testing and Implementation of business systems in
Angular,React,Magento .Net, Mulesoft and Java/J2EE, Salesforce.
• Have worked on customer facing environment to meet Business Objectives and proposed feasible solutions for successful
implementation.
• Have worked in E-commerce and Saas Domains and Web and mobile Based applications.
• Work with st
